summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2440, for the improvement of West 49th Street, from 24th Avenue Northwest to 28th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 25975 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
